law.catch_line: Transfers From Income To Reimburse Principal
law.text: [Text of section applicable as provided by 2005, 129, Sec. 6.] If an amount chargeable to income is unusually large, a trustee may pay all or any part of such amount from principal and shall reimburse principal by transfers from income over a reasonable period of time.
